thread.title: Lady Gaga rocked fire engine red eye makeup at the Grammys – here’s how to get the look
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga rocked fire engine red eye makeup at the Grammys – here’s how to get the look

author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
title: Lady Gaga rocked fire engine red eye makeup at the Grammys – here’s how to get the look
text:
Lady Gaga rocked fire engine red eye makeup at the Grammys – here’s how to get the look Lady Gaga’s beauty and style game are always a perfect 100, but lately she’s been rocking some seriously killer looks that are inspiring us to kick it up a notch! Last night, she wore red eyeliner at the Grammys and instantly had us scrambling around to find some dupes so we can recreate her look for ourselves . As usual, Gaga looked INCREDIBLE — like, seriously woman, how do you always know how to bring us life?
The liner itself was out of this world, but it was only accentuated by the fact that her skin was glowing, her lips were perfect, and her brows were on POINT. She killed it! Her makeup artist, Sarah Tanno, gave us a look at the products she used to create this beautiful look , and unsurprisingly we’re seeing a lot of Marc Jacobs beauty products here!
Love this beat #grammys #ladygaga #sarahtannomakeup #makeup #marcjacobsbeauty makeup assistant @peggywrightmua #metallica Hair by @fredericaspiras @marcbeauty @thewallgroup Eyes New @marcbeauty Matte Highliner Gel Crayon in (Fine)Wine & Blacquer Twinkle Pop in Leila Velvet Noir Mascara Skin ReMarcable Foundation Remendy Concealer Pen O!Mega Bronzer in Tantric Blush Lush &a Libido Lips Boy Gorgeous 
A photo posted by Sarah Nicole Tanno (@sarahtannomakeup) on Feb 12, 2017 at 6:05pm PST 
Sarah used the Marc Jacobs Highliner Matte Gel Eye Crayon, and you’ll be very pleased to know that it’s currently available online for $25. !
Matte-Not-Flat. Extreme Color. Waterproof. ⠀⠀ ⠀⠀ Introducing the NEW #Highliner Matte Gel Eye Crayon. The second coming of Highliner: award-winning gel eye crayon, now in high-impact MATTE. ⠀⠀ ⠀⠀ Available in the US & Canada: online 1/27 and in store 2/17 from @sephora @marcjacobs @neimanmarcus @bergdorfs and marcjacobsbeauty.com. ⠀⠀ ⠀⠀ Available in the U.K.: online 2/14 and 2/24 in store from @johnlewisretail. Available online and in store from @harrods 3/1. 
A photo posted by Marc Jacobs Beauty (@marcbeauty) on Jan 7, 2017 at 3:51pm PST 
You can get this waterproof liner in stores starting February 17th at Sephora, Marc Jacobs, Neiman Marcus, and Bergdorf’s.
We adore Marc Jacobs’ beauty products, so it’s no wonder that Gaga’s been using them to glam up!
Regram from @sarahtannomakeup, Global Beauty Ambassador for #MarcJacobsBeauty. Sarah created @ladygaga's #Grammy Awards looks.⠀⠀ ⠀ "Getting #RedCarpet ready with my girl @ladygaga. We love tonight's look for the #Grammys! All my @marcbeauty goodies " via @sarahtannomakeup 
A photo posted by Marc Jacobs Beauty (@marcbeauty) on Feb 13, 2017 at 8:14am PST 
Love Gaga’s look but can’t quite shell out the Marc Jacobs price tag? We’ve got a few options for you at a lower price point because everyone deserves a chance to look fierce as hell without having to drop a ton of coin!
Regram from @sarahtannomakeup, Global Beauty Ambassador for #MarcJacobsBeauty. Sarah created @ladygaga's #Grammy Awards Red Carpet look.⠀ ⠀ "LADY GAGA on the #grammys #RedCarpet! Love this bad ass red eye using the new @marcbeauty #Highliner Matte Gel Eye Crayon in (Fine)Wine and lips in #LeMarc Lip Crème in Boy Gorgeous." ✨ via @sarahtannomakeup. 
A video posted by Marc Jacobs Beauty (@marcbeauty) on Feb 12, 2017 at 10:44pm PST 
1. NYX Vivid Brights Liner in Vivid Red , $7. NYX 2. Sephora Collection Contour Matte Gel Eyeliner in Sly Like A Fox , $7 Sephora 3. INGLOT AMC Eyeliner Gel in 79 , $15. Macy's 4. Touch in Sol Style Neon Super Proof Gel Liner in Burning Sunset , $16. Sephora 5. Love Culture Hot Red Retractable Waterproof Lip and Eyeliner , $2.95. Love Culture Voila!
Would you ever rock some red eyeliner a la Gaga? It definitely requires a fair amount of confidence, but damn if it doesn’t pay off in the end. This red hot look might be just the thing to spice up your Valentine’s Day look, don’t you think? Talk about powerful!
